resources.string:
Please choose a directory where TOAV Photos should place its directory tree. A new folder "TOAVPhotos" will be created in the directory you select and everything will be put in there.
 - The directory you choose is the highest that will be accessible through this app.
 - For example, you can choose the root or the "DCIM" directory.
 - This can't be changed except by reinstalling the app.
